Napa.Vichy Springs, Napa County, California:
Vichy Springs is a small unincorporated community in Napa County, California. Vichy Springs is situated south of the Silverado Country Club and Milliken Creek on Montecello Road a few miles northeast of Napa.
Vichy Springs and most of the surrounding lands had once been part of the Mexican land grant Rancho Yajome.
